review: I ended up returning it in favor of a refurbed Roku 3 for the headphones, this one had buttons that seemed unresponsive, and the headphones on the Roku 3 was too good of a deal to pass up.  I use the Roku 3 and the headphones a lot, especially when there's a sleeping child/spouse in the room.  This would be a great deal as an intro to streaming TV, a secondary TV, or for a kids room.
author: Miss Courtney

review: I ordered a new, not a refurbished Roku Streaming Stick. But I received an open-box unit. The seal on the box had been broken. Nothing in the box was in a  plastic bag and batteries were loose in the box. I had a hard time making the remote to work. I managed to connect the stick to my WiFi network. But the stick could not update its software. The remote stopped working altogether. It appears that I received an item that had been returned as defective by a previous customer as new. This is very disappointing.
